question: What percent of all the household wealth in the United States does the top 0.1% (that is, one in one thousand people) own?
How much has the unemployment rate increased or decreased between January 2009, when President Obama took office, and March 2016?
options: Unemployment increased by more than 5 percentage points
Unemployment increased by less than 2 percentage point
Unemployment decreased by less than 2 percentage point
Unemployment decreased by more than 5 percentage points
